snippet: Julio Rocha, the former president of the Nicaraguan soccer federation, has consented to extradition to his home country.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; FIFA official Julio Rocha, former president of Nicaraguan soccer federation, has consented to extradition from Switzerland to Nicaragua; Rocha is among seven FIFA officials arrested in Zurich in May on bribery charges; United States filed extradition charges on officials in July, and US authorities will have chance to object or consent to Rocha's extradition to Nicaragua.
lead_paragraph: Julio Rocha, the former president of the Nicaraguan soccer federation, has consented to extradition to his home country.

headline.main: FIFA Official Agrees to Extradition, Just Not to U.S.
